Title: Clinical pharmacokinetics of intravenous and oral bretylium tosylate in survivors of ventricular tachycardia or fibrillation: clinical application of a new assay for bretylium.

Sentece: During chronic therapy (mean dose, 41 mg/kg/day bretylium tosylate), mean minimum steady-state concentration of bretylium was 186 ng/ml (range, 72-461) and was accurately predicted, within experimental error, by using the elimination rate constant determined for oral, but not intravenous, drug in normal subjects (lambda po1 = 0.115 hr-1).
